amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for the Advanced Research Projects Agency - Energy (ARPA-E) account by $20 million and reduces funds for the Departmental Administration account of the Department of Energy by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Advanced Research Projects Agency - Energy (ARPA-E) account by $20 million and reduce funds for the Departmental Administration account of the Department of Energy by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 205 (Roll no. 383).
